subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who is known as the 'Lion of Mewar' and famously resisted Mughal emperor Akbar?
question_hi: कौन 'मेरू के शेर' के नाम से प्रसिद्ध है और मुगल सम्राट अकबर के खिलाफ प्रसिद्ध संघर्ष किया?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap, the ruler of Mewar, is celebrated for his valor and resistance against the Mughal Empire led by Akbar.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप, मेवाड़ के शासक, मुगल सम्र
